name: Dirk Nowitzki
description: 7'0" power forward, changed the game for bigs. 2011 champion, MVP. The one-legged fadeaway. German legend who stayed loyal.

one-leg-fadeaway.name: One-Legged Fadeaway
one-leg-fadeaway.description: Signature unguardable shot - fading on one leg
one-leg-fadeaway.expression: confident release, this shot is money
one-leg-fadeaway.prompt: shooting one-legged fadeaway - standing on one leg fading backward, shooting arm extended high, ball at apex of release, 7-footer with guard skills, completely unguardable shot

championship-trophy.name: 2011 Finals Trophy
championship-trophy.description: Holding Finals MVP trophy after beating Miami
championship-trophy.prompt: clutching Finals MVP trophy - emotional expression of vindication, having just beaten the superteam, loyalty rewarded, the ultimate triumph for staying

fist-pump.name: Fist Pump
fist-pump.description: Intense fist pump after big bucket
fist-pump.prompt: intense fist pump celebration - arm pumping, face showing passionate intensity, the fire that burned beneath calm exterior, big moment energy

sick-game.name: Playing Sick
sick-game.prompt: playing while visibly sick - slightly pale but still dominant, refusing to let illness stop championship quest, the 2011 Finals where he played through sickness and dominated

long-three.name: Deep Three
long-three.expression: range for days, guard skills in big body
long-three.prompt: shooting deep three-pointer - 7-foot frame with perfect shooting form, ball leaving hands from well beyond arc, the shot that changed what big men could do

salute.name: Retirement Salute
salute.description: Saluting Dallas fans in final season
salute.prompt: saluting the crowd in emotional farewell - hand to forehead, eyes glistening, 21 years with one team, loyalty personified, saying goodbye to faithful fans
